Desc.eng: Bighead sent you! I know! Iâ€™m the cleverest head! BWAHAHA! Answer my question now. Which is the strongest? Fire, water, stone or wind?
Wind, because eventually it will wear down even a mountain.
Fire, because the heat will crack the stones.
Water, because it will carve its way through the rocks.
Good answer, little flesh-thing! You can go now!
You think rock is weak? You think I are weak! Suffer-suffer!
